name: Altered State
description: A Altered State Machine MCP serer for generating images and 3D models

name: Apple Notes
description: The server implements the ability to read and write to your Apple Notes. Require Python>=3.12.

name: Blender
description: a blender mcp server enables prompt assisted 3D modeling, scene creation, and manipulation

name: File System
description: The server will only allow operations within directories specified via args.
args: {{dirs@list::directories you about to access. Trailing slash in path required.}}

description: This server allowing LLMs to interact with Linear issues.
A Model Context Protocol server that provides macOS-specific system information and operations.

name: Sequential Thinking
description: An MCP server tool for dynamic problem-solving with structured thinking.
A Node.js MCP implementation enables secure shell command execution for AI models.
MCP Server for the Slack API, enabling Claude to interact with Slack workspaces.
A Model Context Protocol server that provides web content fetching capabilities
This MCP server allows Clients to interact with Twitter, enabling posting tweets and searching Twitter.

env.API_KEY: {{apiKey@string::You can get the API_KEY from https://developer.twitter.com/}}
env.API_SECRET_KEY: {{apiSecret@string::You can get the API_SECRET_KEY from https://developer.twitter.com/m}}
env.ACCESS_TOKEN: {{accessToken@string::You can get the ACCESS_TOKEN from https://developer.twitter.com/}}
env.ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET: {{accessSecret@string::You can get the ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET from https://developer.twitter.com/}}

description: A Model Context Protocol server providing tools for time queries and timezone conversions for LLMs
args: --local-timezone={{timezone@string::like Asia/Shanghai. You may need install tzdata first}}
